name: CheapShooter
description:
CheapShooter Description

Shooter game, with inspiration in the frenetic bullet hell format with "lowpoly" graphics. 

The main goal is simple: to kill enemies, through challenges and stages. 
This is a implemented version 0.1 beta. There is a ready gameplay, points system and life count working. Maybe some bugs... :)

History (Why I made this)

I'm Denis a brazilian software developer. And this is my first game and the first time that i try to develop a game. 

I just want to get some experience during the GameJam at ADPJ, realized between 01/06/2018 and 08/07/2018.
It was a a big challenged for me. To accomplish the objetive of finish my first game (very, very simple I know) I learn in a month and a half a basics of Unity and Blender. 

Next Steps:

In the next months I will continue develop some new features:

  • Build 3 more stages;
  • Build 5 different enimies;
  • Build one BOSS for every stage;
  • Improve visual effects;
  • Drop life, and other power stuffs for the player;
  • Second player shot;
  • ... and other small things;
Tools Used:
  • Unity 2018.01;
  • Blender;
  • Gimp;

PS: All assets used in the game are free.
